#### Paquetes

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
```

#### Datos

```{r}
data("penguins")
head(penguins)
```

### Contenido{.tabset .tabset-pills}

#### `dplyr`

- `select()`: seleccionar columnas

```{r}
sp_islas <- select(penguins, species, island)
head(sp_islas)
summary(sp_islas)
```

- `filter()`: filtrar filas

```{r}
sp_Adelie <- filter(penguins, species == "Adelie")
summary(sp_Adelie)
```

- `arrange()`: reordenar filas

```{r}
orden <- arrange(penguins, desc(bill_length_mm))
head(orden)
```

- `mutate()`: crear nuevas columnas

```{r}
peso_kg <- mutate(penguins, body_mass_kg = body_mass_g / 1000)
head(peso_kg)
```

- `summarise()`: resumen de valores

```{r}
resumen <- summarise(penguins, range(na.omit(bill_length_mm)))
resumen
```


- `group_by()`: agrupar

```{r}
medias <- penguins %>%
  group_by(species) %>%
  summarise(mean(na.omit(body_mass_g)))
medias
```
